messages.body: $TSLA Tech stocks set to slump again, as Nasdaq futures drop 1% Apple trades lower premarket after another downgrade http://on.mktw.net/2rRieZR

links.title: Tech stocks set to slump again, as Nasdaq-100 futures drop 1%
links.description: By U.S. stock futures pointed to a drop at the open, with the technology sector on track for a tumble for a second straight session. Futures for the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 index fell by 56 points, or 1%, to 5,692.25.
